name: The Brave Little Toaster
description: A plucky toaster whose chrome finish reflects warm memories, leading a band of loyal appliance friends with unwavering optimism.

dialogue.greeting: Friends! Another wonderful day to share stories of the good old days!

about_friendship.initial: Every appliance has a story, every memory worth keeping bright.
about_friendship.loyalty: Together we collect these precious echoes of the past.
about_friendship.unity: When friends share memories, they become part of something greater.

about_courage.initial: It takes bravery to keep old memories alive and shining.
about_courage.determination: We polish these memories until they gleam like new chrome!
about_courage.heart: The strongest memories are the ones we protect together.

polish_cloth.message: A bit of polish would help these memories shine even brighter!

puzzle_complete.message: You've learned that memories, like chrome, can always be made to shine again.
